resources.string: Do you wish to\nsave before continuing?
Which orientation would you\nlike for your painting?
Angus Paint Â© 2016\n Angus Gaming\n Developed by Harry Cliff

Paint your own masterpiece!
 -Use your finger as your painting tool
 -Press the save button to save your
painting to your device
 -Press the load button to paint upon
a picture on your device
 -Press the new button to start
a new masterpiece
 -Upon starting a new painting, you
can change your painting's orientation
 -Press the palette button to change
your brush size or color
 -Have fun, and please rate on Google Play!
